TextLibrary.Text: I have a mission for you, young man. If we are going to defeat the Soulless, we need to learn their weakness.
I have a mission for you, young lady. If we are going to defeat the Soulless, we need to learn their weakness.

You need to travel towards the Gehenna Rim. Head for Gomorrah Station - it's full of Pirates but my sources tell me they're holding out against the Soulless. If anybody might know something, it's them.

You need to travel towards the Gehenna Rim. Head for Gomorrah Station - it's full of Pirates but my sources tell me they're holding out against the Soulless. If anybody might know something, it's them.
No. One ship might sneak through. A fleet will be detected and attacked. You've shown you can take these filthy creatures on in small numbers. You'll survive.
No. One ship might sneak through. A fleet will be detected and attacked. You've shown you can take these filthy creatures on in small numbers. You'll survive.
